#testbench instructions
000000 00001 00010 00011 00000 100000 #add r3 = r1 + r2
001000 00001 00100 00000 00000 000111 #addi r4 = r1 + 7
000000 00001 00010 00101 00000 100010 #sub r5 = r1 - r2
000000 00001 00010 00110 00000 100100 #and r6 = r1 & r2
001100 00001 00111 00000 00000 000001 #andi r7 = r1 & 1
000000 00001 00010 01000 00000 100111 #nor r8 = r1 nor r2
000000 00001 00010 01001 00000 100101 #or r9 = r1 or r2
001101 00001 01010 00000 00000 000100 #ori r10 = r1 or 4
001111 00000 01011 11111 11111 111111 #lui r11 = all ones, whatever that is.
000000 00001 00010 01100 00000 101010 #slt r12 = r1 < r2
001010 00001 01101 00000 00000 001010 #slti r13 = r1 < 10

Results: r1 = 3, r2 = 1
r3 = 4  √
r4 = 10 √
r5 = 2 √
r6 = 1 √
r7 = 1 √
r8 = 1111111111111100 √
r9 = 3 √
r10 = 7 √
r11 = 1111111111111111 √
r12 = 0 √
r13 = 1 √
